sources.title: The Bulldog Breed
sources.description: Title: The Bulldog Breed Summary: When he is crossed in love, grocers assistant Norman Puckle joins the Navy, where he is recruited to man the first British rocket. Directed by: Robert Asher Actors: Norman Wisdom, Ian Hunter, David Lodge Production Company: The Rank Organisation Release Date: 23 December 1960 (Ireland) Aspect Ratio: 1.66 : 1 Color: Black and White When he is crossed in love, grocers assistant Norman Puckle joins the Navy, where he is recruited to man the first British rocket.
